data.message: Eminem is the most talented rapper Ever !! only people that have never bought and listened to all of his albums would disagree , its so obvious !!

replies.message: and people who only listen to eminem would say something so dumb
It's not dumb he's in Guinness world record for rapping, so he clearly is the most talented rapper
Eminem will now be known as the artist who made the wordiest hit single: his six-minute “Rap God” has 1,560 words  - Thats why hes in the guinness world records
Mia Dunk, stop killing hip-hop. Please. Why do you do this.
I don't buy his music, but I listen to most of his music and I still like him tho, I think he's the best and my favorite rapper!
Baljeet kumar listen to 90s rap and then u can talk about rap otherwise shut up
mayne i respect 90's hip hop cos that's some real shit but you can't deny Eminem did it , he proved himself to be at the top in all em black's . So why not accept it ha ?
